service.title: HTTP Header Field Registrations
service.documentation: HTTP/1.0 and HTTP/1.1 define protocol constructs (respectively, the HTTP-header and message-header BNF rules) that are used as message headers. These specifications also define a number of HTTP headers themselves, and they provide for extension through the use of new field-names. This document defines the initial contents of an IANA registry that catalogs permanent HTTP header field-names, and of an IANA repository that catalogs provisional HTTP header field-names. Both are operated according to Registration Procedures for Message Header Fields.

http-header.documentation: The title of the document. Not part of the document. Isomorphic with the <title> element in HTML.
